name: Mighty Patch Mini Invisible+ Patches - X-Small Daytime Hydrocolloid Acne Pimple Patches for Covering Zits & Blemishes, Blends Into Skin & Barely There (30 Count, 10mm Patch)
short_description: 🤏 MIGHTY PATCH: MINI EDITION: Mighty Patch Mini Invisible+ patches are our smallest and stealthiest patch yet. Super-thin and so comfortable that you might forget it’s even there.

🔍 BARELY THERE FOR DAYTIME WEAR: Clocking in at just 10mm and featuring tapered edges that blend into skin seamlessly, this patch is barely there. That means you can feel confident wearing it out and about.
🌅 WOKE UP WITH A PIMPLE?: Don’t stress– Mighty Patch Mini Invisible+ patches absorb gunk in 6-8 hours. Just put one on, start your day, and forget your zit is even there.

☀️ YOUR DAYTIME HERO: With the gunk-absorbing hydrocolloid power you know and love, just smaller. We recommend Mighty Patch Mini Invisible+ patches for the day, and Mighty Patch Original patches for the night.
❤️‍🩹 SUPPORTS A HEALING ENVIRONMENT: Mighty Patch Mini Invisible+ patches don’t just help improve the look of pimples– they also help shield skin from popping, picking, and squeezing.

short_description: Largest Variety Pack with 443 Patches: This pimple patches bulk pack offers the largest quantity of hydrocolloid patches available, providing exceptional value for teens and young adults dealing with frequent breakouts. With plenty of patches on hand for every single-spot breakouts, it also includes larger patches to effectively manage occasional flare-ups involving clusters of acne

This variety ensures you have the perfect fit for all types of blemishes, providing precise coverage for any area of your face or body, whether it's your cheeks, forehead, chin, chest, or back

Advanced Hydrocolloid Core: Our zit patches are made from hydrocolloid, this gel-forming material is a sophisticated blend of skin-adhesive polymers and emollients (detailed in our full ingredient list). It contains no added fragrances, essential oils, or harsh actives, making it odorless, non-irritating, and an ideal choice for fragrance-sensitive or reactive skin

Pimple Be Gone: Our hydrocolloid pimple patches feature 60% more gunk-absorbing strength, effectively pulling pus from whiteheads at the source. In just 6 hours, these patches help reduce the appearance of pimple or large clusters, leaving your skin looking flatter and clearer

Easy to Use: Simply clean and dry the affected area, then peel and apply the acne patch for overnight use or your desired duration (at least 4 hours). Our pimple patches are easy to remove and come individually packaged, making them convenient to carry for quick access in case of emergencies

Shrinks inflammation and redness.
